subject: This is for your Attention,
body:
This is for your Attention,
We wish to notify you that you were listed as beneficiary to the total
sum of US$9 Million only in the intent of the deceased. On my first
email I mentioned about my late client whose relatives I cannot get in
touch with. But both of you have the same last name so it will be very
easy to front you as his official next of kin. I am compelled to do
this because I would not want the finance house to push my clients
funds into their treasury as unclaimed inheritance.
We contacted you because you bear the Last name with our Late Client
and therefore can present you as the Beneficiary to the inheritance
since there is no written will. Our legal services aim to provide our
private clients with a complete service. We are happy to set-up all
modalities and administer Trusts,carry out the administration of
estates. All the papers will be processed in your acceptance of this
Transaction.
Note that you are to furnishing me with the requested information's
bellow immediately;
Full names.
Contact address.
Telephone and fax numbers.
If you are interested you do let me know so that I can give you
Comprehensive details on what we are to do. Waiting for your response.
Yours truly,
Mr. Eric Howard.

subject: Re:   This is for your Attention,
body:
Hello Mr. Eric Howard,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I must say, it is quite surprising to receive such an email. I do share the same last name as your late client, but I'm not sure how that would make me eligible to be their official next of kin. Could you please explain further?

Also, I'm curious about the finance house you mentioned and why they would push my supposed inheritance into their treasury if it remains unclaimed. Is there a specific reason for this? And what role would your legal services play in all of this?

Before proceeding any further, could you provide more details about the late client and their estate? It would be helpful to have a better understanding of the situation.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: This is for your Attention,
body:
Dear Kenneth,

Thank you for your email please forward the email you received from me
send it as a Forwarded mail to my email

And also furnish me with this details as it will be requested to proceed also.

Full Name:
Mailing Address:
Phone Number:
Occupation:

I wait further update from you.

Eric Howard

subject: Re: This is for your Attention,
body:
Dear Eric Howard,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry, but I don't recall receiving any email from you. Could you please provide me with more details about the email you mentioned? What was the subject of the email and when was it sent?

I would be happy to help if I can, so please let me know how I can assist you further.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Update
body: Give me a Phone number to call you now

subject: Re: Update
body:
Hello! I hope you're doing well. Unfortunately, I'm not able to provide my phone number at the moment. However, I'm more than happy to continue our conversation here. How can I assist you?

Best wishes,
Kenneth

You sent me this mail as a response to my mail to you kindly forward
the mail I sent you to my email now Thank you

subject: Re: This is for your Attention,
body:
Hello Mr. Eric Howard,

Thank you for your prompt response. I apologize for any confusion caused by my previous email. I am indeed interested in learning more about the situation you mentioned.

To clarify, could you please explain how having the same last name as your late client would make me eligible to be their official next of kin? I'm curious to understand the connection.

Regarding the finance house and their decision to push the funds into their treasury if it remains unclaimed, is there a specific reason behind this? It seems like an unusual course of action. Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could elaborate on the role your legal services would play in all of this.

Before we proceed any further, it would be helpful if you could provide more details about the late client and their estate. This will allow me to have a better understanding of the situation at hand.

Lastly, I noticed that you mentioned forwarding an email that was sent to me. Could you please clarify which email you are referring to? Once I have a clear understanding, I will do my best to assist you accordingly.

Thank you once again for reaching out to me. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: This is for your Attention,
body:
Lastly, I noticed that you mentioned forwarding an email that was sent to me.

The very email you received from me before your first response and
also before we can do anything we need to talk on Phone let us have a
phone conversation Thank you.

subject: Re: This is for your Attention,
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in talking on the phone. However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with some more information about the purpose of our conversation? I just want to make sure that we are on the same page.

Best wishes,
Kenneth
